title: Schedule
text:
We will update this list as we continue to confirm speakers in the months leading up to the Summit.
Ethan Creagar (Data Scientist, Houston Dynamo FC)
John Muller (Football writer, The Athletic, FiveThirtyEight, and more)
Pat Onstad (General Manager, Houston Dynamo FC)
Stefan Szymanski (Professor of Sport Management, University of Michigan)

title: Schedule
text:
Friday, January 31, 2025
The schedule skeleton below is a rough draft to give the flavor of the agenda, and it will change.
1:00p-2:00p Keynote Speaker
2:00p-4:00p Speaker Session 1
5:00p-7:00p Women in Soccer Analytics Networking Reception

title: Schedule
text:
Saturday, February 1, 2025
The schedule skeleton below is a rough draft to give the flavor of the agenda, and it will change.
9:00a-11:00a Speaker Session 2
11:00a-12:00p Speaker Session 3A
1:30p-2:30p Speaker Session 3B
3:00p-5:00p Speaker Session 4
Students will have an opportunity to submit proposals for research projects using proprietary data.

title: Registration
text:
Early registration features a 10% discount and is available until December 1, or until we sell out.
Early registration (up to December 1): $180
Late registration (after December 1): $200

title: Registration
text:
Early registration features a 10% discount and is available until December 1, or until we sell out.
Early registration (up to December 1): $180
Late registration (after December 1): $200

title: Registration
text:
Student Pricing (with valid student ID)
Student-priced registrations are limited, so students are encouraged not to delay registration.
Early registration (up to December 1): $90
Late registration (after December 1): $100

 Register

title: American Soccer Insights Summit
Sponsors
text:
The ASI Summit is partially funded by a grant from the Office of Research at Rice.
We are seeking additional sponsors to keep registration costs accessible and to fund travel for deserving students. If you are interested in becoming a sponsor, please contact us at americansoccerinsights@gmail.com.

title: Location
text: The ASI Summit will be held at the Anderson-Clarke Center on the campus of Rice University.

title: Location
text: The ASI Summit will be held at the Anderson-Clarke Center on the campus of Rice University.

title: Location
text:
Parking
We will have free parking available on site for ASI Summit attendees.

title: Location
text:
Hotels
We have a limited number of rooms reserved in a block at the nearby DoubleTree in the Houston Medical Center, a 15-minute walk from the Anderson-Clarke Center. Book your stay at our discounted group rate using this link.
